autoPkg.autoPkgNote: This function is for development environment use only and is not recommended for production use. For specific usage effects, please watch the video https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1kv4y1g7nT?p=3
autoPkg.templatePackageNote: The template package will create a code package integrated into the project body, and the template plugin will create a plugin package
autoPkg.deletePackageNote: This operation only deletes the pkg storage in the database. Please delete the corresponding directory structure of the backend by yourself to keep it consistent with the database!

autoCode.autoCodeNote: This feature is for development environments only and is not recommended for production. Click here to see the specific usage effect.
autoCode.aiCodeNote:
【Beta】Try to describe your table and let AI help you complete it. 
Currently in the testing stage, please give us feedback if you encounter any problems. 
This function requires you to obtain your own AI-Path from the personal center of the plug-in market, fill in the AI-Path in autocode-->ai-path under config.yaml, and restart the project to use it.
autoCode.xiaoqiNote: Xiaoqi has a chance of failure, and is open to all users (if it fails, just regenerate it).
autoCode.xiaomiaoNote: Xiaomiao can basically design anything, but it requires points. During the testing phase, authorized users automatically obtain basic points, and open source users need to fill out an application form.
autoCode.dbListNote: Note: You need to go to db-list to configure multiple databases in advance. If not configured, you need to restart the service after configuration before you can use it. (Here you can select the corresponding library table, which can be understood as which library to select the table from)
autoCode.autoAPIDBTip: Note: Register the automatically generated API into the database
autoCode.autoMenuDBTip: Note: Register the automatically generated menu into the database
autoCode.autoSyncDBNote: Note: Automatic synchronization of database table structure can be turned off if not necessary.
autoCode.buttonPermissionNote: Note: The button permission configuration within the page will be automatically generated. If the button is not assigned in the role management, the button will not be visible.
autoCode.createdByNote: Note: created_by updated_by deleted_by will be automatically added to the structure to facilitate user resource permission control.
autoCode.createResourceIDNote: Note: Using the basic template will not generate any structure and CURD. Only enter and other properties are configured to facilitate the development of non-CURD logic
autoCode.autoMoveFilesTip: Note: Automatically migrate the generated files to the corresponding location of the ymal configuration
autoCode.codeGenDownload: The automation code was created successfully and is being downloaded
autoCode.codeGenMoveSuccess: The automated code was created and moved successfully
autoCode.searchConditionNote: Please select the field search conditions
autoCode.entStructAbbreviation: Please enter the abbreviation of the structure
autoCode.errNoFields: Please fill in at least one field
autoCode.errSameFiledName: There is a field with the same name as the structure
autoCode.errSameStructDescAbbr: Struct name and struct abbreviation cannot be the same
autoCode.existDB: Click here to create code from an existing database
autoCode.selectIndexType: Please select the field index type
autoCode.fileNameNote: The default name of the generated file (camel case format is recommended, the first letter is lowercase, such as sysXxxXxxx)
autoCode.structAbbreviationNote: Please enter the abbreviation of Struct
autoCode.structNameNote: The first letter is automatically converted to uppercase
autoCode.dbListNote2: Note: You need to go to db-list in advance to configure multiple databases. If this item is empty, the gva library will be used to create the automation code (global.GVA_DB). If it is filled in, the code of the specified library will be created (global.MustGetGlobalDBByDBName(dbname))
autoCode.globalModelNote: Note: The global.Model structure will automatically contain the primary key and soft delete related operation configurations
autoCode.useGVAStructNote: If you enable the GVA default structure, the ID, CreatedAt, UpdatedAt, and DeletedAt fields will be automatically added. This behavior will automatically clear the duplicate fields you have created below. Do you want to continue?
autoCode.primeryKeyError: You need to create at least one primary key to ensure the feasibility of the automation code
autoCode.allFieldError: Please fill in all fields and submit
autoCode.packageStructAbbreviationError: Package and structure abbreviation cannot have the same name
autoCode.basicTemplateNote: Using the basic template will not generate any structure and CURD. Only enter and other properties will be configured to facilitate the development of non-CURD logic.

fieldDialog.note: id, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at will be automatically generated. Please do not create it repeatedly. If the condition is LIKE when searching, only strings are supported
fieldDialog.dataSourceConfigNote: Data source configuration (this configuration is advanced and may cause the automation code to be unavailable if the programming foundation is not solid)
fieldDialog.selectDataSourceTable: Please select the data source table
fieldDialog.selectDataToStore: Please select the data you want to store first
fieldDialog.selectDataToDisplay: Please select the data you want to display first
fieldDialog.oneToManyNote: In one-to-many association mode, the data type will change to array, and the backend will be represented as json, specifically in array mode. Do you want to continue?

exportTemplate.exportTemplateNote: This function provides synchronous table export function and asynchronous table export function for large data volume. You can choose to customize it.
exportTemplate.searchDateHint: The search range is from the start date (inclusive) to the end date (exclusive)
exportTemplate.dbListNote: Note: You need to go to db-list to configure multiple databases in advance. If not configured, you need to restart the service after configuration before you can use it. If you cannot choose, please set disabled:false in config.yaml and select the target library for import and export.
exportTemplate.templateIdNote: The template identifier is the identifier attribute that the front-end component needs to hang on
exportTemplate.jsonKeyNote: The json key that needs to be fetched from the query condition
exportTemplate.columnNote: The corresponding column of the table
exportTemplate.templatePlaceholder1: Template information format: key identifies the database column name (needs to be written as table.column in join mode), value identifies the exported Excel column name. If key is a database keyword or function, please process it according to the keyword processing mode. Currently, MySQL is taken as an example, as follows:
exportTemplate.templatePlaceholder5: I am a database keyword or function
exportTemplate.startDateBeforeEndDate: Start date should be before end date
exportTemplate.selectDBAndTable: Please select the business library and selection table before operating
exportTemplate.templateInfoFormatError: The template information format is incorrect, please check
exportTemplate.exportConditionError: Please fill in the complete export conditions
exportTemplate.completeAssociationError: Please fill in the complete association
